byline.original: By EMMARIE HUETTEMAN and SABRINA TAVERNISE

lead_paragraph: As Congress returned from recess, a stalemate resumed over a $1.1 billion plan to fight the virus even as public health experts warned that funding was desperately needed.

headline.print_headline: Senate Democrats Again Stymie Funding for Zika
headline.main: Senate Democrats Block Zika Bill Over Planned Parenthood Provisions

snippet: As Congress returned from recess, a stalemate resumed over a $1.1 billion plan to fight the virus even as public health experts warned that funding was desperately needed....
abstract: Senate Democrats block Republican-backed legislation that would allocate $1.1 billion in emergency funding to fight Zika virus; standoff is focused on restrictions contained in bill excluding Planned Parenthood from list of providers receiving funding to combat spread of disease.
